title: Syndra recall
body:
Syndra's recall doesn't seem to look alright, it messes up everytime, someone please take a look at her

Her recall is supposed to be a landing but she lands+gets up+auto lands again it's not right

replies.body: Sorry for the wicked long wait/update. We're looking to (finally) have this solved for next patch!

Hey Bailing Out - 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ We're aware of the issue and are looking into it!
